title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a built-in model library and OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node.js and browsers; chat, stream, and manage local models via Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding backends in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent storage.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama server and CLI across Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on that runs Ollama locally for private voice-assistant pipelines.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package (JS SDK) downloaded 150k+ times; provides typed wrappers for chat, generate, list, pull.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package (Python SDK) with async/sync clients, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled Ollama instances on AWS/Azure/GCP with one command.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up ephemeral Ollama services for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio, serde, and examples for chat & embeddings.
